scripts.internal::build::common: xcodebuild -project "Brownfield Apple App.xcodeproj" -scheme "Brownfield Apple App" -sdk iphonesimulator build CODE_SIGNING_ALLOWED=NO -derivedDataPath ./build
scripts.build:example:ios-consumer:expo: node prepareXCFrameworks.js --appName ExpoApp && yarn internal::build::common -configuration "Release Expo"
scripts.build:example:ios-consumer:vanilla: node prepareXCFrameworks.js --appName RNApp && yarn internal::build::common -configuration "Release Vanilla"
